title: Tech/AI Audit
tagline: Technical diagnosis and roadmap in 5 business days

forWhom.title: Who is this audit for?
bullets: You have a tech/AI idea or project but don't know if it's feasible or where to start
Your internal team lacks AI/ML expertise and you want an external assessment
You want a clear plan (risks, quick wins, 30/60/90 day roadmap) before investing

items.name: Technical Diagnosis Report
items.description: Analysis of current state: architecture, stack, available data, technical debt

items.name: Risk Assessment
items.description: Technical, timeline, cost and compliance risks. Overall feasibility (Go/No-Go/Go with modifications)

items.name: Quick Wins
items.description: 3-5 immediate actions (1-2 weeks) that deliver quick value with minimal effort

items.name: 30/60/90 Day Roadmap
items.description: Phased implementation plan with priorities, dependencies and milestones

items.name: Effort & Budget Estimate
items.description: Ballpark figures for time, costs, required team size

items.name: Q&A Session
items.description: 1 hour video call to discuss the report and answer questions

requirements.title: What we need from you
items: Initial brief (1-2 pages): objective, context, constraints, deadlines
Read-only access to existing repo/code (if applicable)
1-2 hours interview with key stakeholders (phone or video call)
Data samples (if data/AI project) or screenshots of existing systems

process: Schedule kickoff call (1h) to understand objectives and constraints
Analyze your technical situation (code, data, stack, team)
Prepare report with diagnosis, risks, roadmap and estimates
Deliver report and conduct Q&A session (1h)

faq.question: Is 5 days realistic for a complete audit?
faq.answer: Yes. It's an intensive diagnosis, not a multi-month consulting engagement. I focus on identifying main risks, quick wins and phased roadmap. Perfect for pre-investment decisions.

faq.question: What if I don't have code yet, just an idea?
faq.answer: No problem. I can audit feasibility based on brief, similar projects, and market research. Less technical deep dive, more strategic assessment.

faq.question: Do I get recommendations even if the idea isn't feasible?
faq.answer: Absolutely. If there are blocking issues, I'll tell you clearly and suggest alternatives or pivots that could work.

faq.question: Can we continue working together after the audit?
faq.answer: Yes. If audit results are positive and you want to proceed, I can implement the roadmap through MVP Sprint or custom projects.

faq.question: Is the report confidential?
faq.answer: 100%. NDA available upon request. All materials and findings remain your property.
